attributes.action: Reduce solicitors and legal pay to make our law affordable to everyone
attributes.additional_details:
We would like to see a reduction in the cost of law.
a reduction in the pay and earnings of solicitors and legal staff. and that money generated into a robust legal aid system for those who cannot afford our law.
we want to see a country where nobody has to stand alone in court for lack of funds. Far to much money is going into private pockets, whilst the poor have no representation. Time for serious change
